Curly

Organise

Keep you service organised by project so you always know where they are and you don’t have to remember long parameter queries.

Explore

Play around with the parameters of a web-service until you understand it and explore the results in Curly’s hierarchical response viewer.

Test

Verify the reponse of a service using should.js. Run a suite of API tests at the press of a button.

Terminal

Export your services as curl commands so you can easily share them. To monitor them and protect yourself from service changes export them to be run by the Cu...
